page.title: 20BILLERICAY NW Hospitals.
page.content: There are two main hospitals in the area sharing a large green belt site. {St.Andrews Hospital}is a general one without a Casualty Department. It has a Day Centre and conducts minor operations. The hospital possesses a nationally renowned Specialist Burns Unit with extensive facilities for their treatment. Patients are referred to the unit from all over the South East region. The field at the nearby Mayflower School serves as an emergency helicopter pad for patients. The{Mayflower Hospital}is a geriatric unit which runs as a separate section under the administration of St. Andrews. Both short and long stay elderley patients are treated.
